class.name: XRInterfaceExtension
class.brief_description: Base class for XR interface extensions (plugins).
class.description: External XR interface plugins should inherit from this class.

method.name: _end_frame
method.description: Called if interface is active and queues have been submitted.

method.name: _get_anchor_detection_is_enabled
method.description: Return [code]true[/code] if anchor detection is enabled for this interface.

method.name: _get_camera_feed_id
method.description: Returns the camera feed id for the [CameraFeed] registered with the [CameraServer] that should be presented as the background on an AR capable device (if applicable).

method.name: _get_camera_transform
method.description: Returns the [Transform3D] that positions the [XRCamera3D] in the world.

method.name: _get_capabilities
method.description: Returns the capabilities of this interface.

method.name: _get_name
method.description: Returns the name of this interface.

method.name: _get_play_area
method.description: Returns an [PackedVector3Array] that denotes the play areas boundaries (if applicable).

method.name: _get_play_area_mode
method.description: Returns the [enum XRInterface.PlayAreaMode] that sets up our play area.

method.name: _get_projection_for_view
method.description: Returns the projection matrix for the given view as a [PackedFloat64Array].

method.name: _get_render_target_size
method.description: Returns the size of our render target for this interface, this overrides the size of the [Viewport] marked as the xr viewport.

method.name: _get_suggested_pose_names
method.description: Returns a [PackedStringArray] with pose names configured by this interface. Note that user configuration can override this list.

method.name: _get_suggested_tracker_names
method.description: Returns a [PackedStringArray] with tracker names configured by this interface. Note that user configuration can override this list.

method.name: _get_tracking_status
method.description: Returns a [enum XRInterface.TrackingStatus] specifying the current status of our tracking.

method.name: _get_transform_for_view
method.description: Returns a [Transform3D] for a given view.

method.name: _get_view_count
method.description: Returns the number of views this interface requires, 1 for mono, 2 for stereoscopic.

method.name: _initialize
method.description: Initializes the interface, returns [code]true[/code] on success.

method.name: _is_initialized
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this interface has been initialised.

method.name: _notification
method.description: Informs the interface of an applicable system notification.

method.name: _post_draw_viewport
method.description: Called after the XR [Viewport] draw logic has completed.

method.name: _pre_draw_viewport
method.description: Called if this is our primary [XRInterfaceExtension] before we start processing a [Viewport] for every active XR [Viewport], returns [code]true[/code] if that viewport should be rendered. An XR interface may return [code]false[/code] if the user has taken off their headset and we can pause rendering.

method.name: _pre_render
method.description: Called if this [XRInterfaceExtension] is active before rendering starts, most XR interfaces will sync tracking at this point in time.

method.name: _process
method.description: Called if this [XRInterfaceExtension] is active before our physics and game process is called. most XR interfaces will update its [XRPositionalTracker]s at this point in time.

method.name: _set_anchor_detection_is_enabled
method.description: Enables anchor detection on this interface if supported.

method.name: _set_play_area_mode
method.description: Set the play area mode for this interface.

method.name: _supports_play_area_mode
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this interface supports this play area mode.

method.name: _trigger_haptic_pulse
method.description: Triggers a haptic pulse to be emitted on the specified tracker.

method.name: _uninitialize
method.description: Uninitialize the interface.

method.name: add_blit
method.description: Blits our render results to screen optionally applying lens distortion. This can only be called while processing [code]_commit_views[/code].

method.name: get_render_target_texture
method.description: Returns a valid [RID] for a texture to which we should render the current frame if supported by the interface.
